extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processor.MapperUI.MapperUI
extension.description: Map JSON object to SQL create table statement.

property.name: Table Name
property.description: The name of the table to be created.

relationship.name: sql
relationship.description: A FlowFile is routed to this relationship when its contents have successfully been converted into a SQL statement

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: A FlowFile is routed to this relationship if it cannot be converted into a SQL statement. Common causes include invalid JSON content or the JSON content missing a required field.

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: A FlowFile is routed to this relationship when its contents have successfully been converted into a SQL statement

writesAttribute.name: mime.type
writesAttribute.description: Sets mime.type of FlowFile to sql
